message: I'm excited to offer you the product for $1,200,000. This is a one-time opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that will bring you significant benefits. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but that price is a little high for me. Would you consider $1,000,000?

I understand that $1,000,000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $1,100,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate you coming down, Alice. I'm getting closer, but $1,100,000 is still a bit of a stretch for my budget.  Could you do $1,050,000?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you at $1,075,000. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
